static String FileProviderActionName
          Key to hold the service action name of IFileProvider.
Default is LocalFileProvider.ServiceActionName

          Key to hold IFileProvider.FilterMode, default is IFileProvider.FilterMode#FilesOnly.

          Key to hold max file count that's allowed to be listed, default = 1024

static String RegexFilenameFilter
          Key to hold regex filename filter, default = null
static String Results
          Key to hold results (can be one or multiple files)
static String Rootpath
          Key to hold the root path, default is sdcard, if sdcard is not available, "/" will be used.

Note: The value of this key is a File
static String SaveDialog
          Key to hold property save-dialog, default = false
static String SortOrder
          Key to hold IFileProvider.SortOrder, default = IFileProvider.SortOrder#Ascending
static String SortType
          Key to hold IFileProvider.SortType, default = IFileProvider.SortType#SortByName
